Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, preventing duplicate primary key values which could cause data integrity issues
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that all rows in tsb.customer_data_bank have a non-null customer_id, ensuring completeness of the primary key
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in full_name, which may be critical for customer identification and downstream processes
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in date_of_birth, which may impact age calculation and regulatory compliance
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in gender, which may be required for demographic analysis
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in address, which may be necessary for communication and verification
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in phone_number, which may be required for customer contact and notifications
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in email_address, which may be needed for electronic communication and marketing
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in national_id_or_passport_number, which may be required for identity verification
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in occupation, which may be relevant for customer profiling
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in customer_type, which may impact segmentation and reporting
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in account_numbers, which may be required for linking customers to accounts
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in age, which may be used for eligibility and risk assessment
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in created_by, which may be needed for audit and traceability
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in created_on, which may be required for audit and record creation tracking
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in modified_by, which may be important for tracking changes
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in modified_on, which may be important for tracking when records were last updated
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in status, which may be required for workflow and reporting
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks that age values are not negative, ensuring logical consistency for customer age
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age < 0

Description: Checks that date_of_birth is not in the future, ensuring valid birth dates
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth > CURRENT_DATE

Description: Checks that email_address values conform to a basic email pattern, reducing risk of invalid contact information
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~ '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks that phone_number values contain only digits, plus, minus, spaces, or parentheses, ensuring valid phone numbers
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~ '^[0-9+\-\(\) ]+$'

Description: Checks that gender values are within expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other), preventing invalid entries
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks that status values are within expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended), ensuring valid workflow status
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Checks for duplicate email_address values, which may indicate multiple records for the same customer
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which may indicate multiple records for the same identity
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for logical consistency between age and date_of_birth, flagging records where age does not match the calculated value
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, age, date_of_birth FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(date_of_birth))

Description: Checks that created_on is not after modified_on, ensuring logical record update sequence
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, created_on, modified_on FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > modified_on

Description: Checks for account_numbers values that do not match expected format (e.g., comma-separated list of digits), ensuring valid account linkage
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NOT NULL AND account_numbers !~ '^([0-9]+,)*[0-9]+$'

Monitor Name: Validity: created_on is not in future
Description: Checks that created_on timestamp is not in the future, ensuring valid record creation dates
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on > NOW()

Monitor Name: Validity: modified_on is not in future
Description: Checks that modified_on timestamp is not in the future, ensuring valid record modification dates
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on > NOW()
